passage:
A variety of planter pots all yours for 10,000₩.
My apartment is on the KAIST College of Business campus near Kyunghee University. This area is between Korea University subway station (Line 6) and Hoegi Station (Line 1). Also, you can get here by taking either Bus 201 or 273 (홍릉 or Seoul Biohub stops).
Easy to get here. Easy to pick up. Or I can meet you at one of the subway stations or bus stops mentioned above.<|endoftext|>
